archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.3.10: Critical business applications and underlying technical infrastructure should be protected against targeted cyber attacks (e.g. denial of service attacks, hacking or targeted malware) that may disrupt business processes by:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
